name: Hiragana Game - Learn Japanese with JapaneseMEOW
name_original: Hiragana Game - Learn Japanese with JapaneseMEOW
description:
Hello!  I'm Keiko, from JapaneseMEOW Language School (http://JapaneseMEOW.com).  

This game is a fun way to practice your Hiragana!  For those of you who don't know, Hiragana is a Japanese syllabary - a major component of the Japanese writing system.   We will develop a Katakana version as well, so please check it out when you're done here.  If you have never studied Hiragana before, I suggest studying the chart at least a little bit before you begin:

Have fun, and let me know if we should add/change anything.  It's an ongoing project that we want to continue improving.  Please leave your feedback!
